segments.text: I am interested in buying a house and need some information .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , of course . What area are you interested in ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am interested in Pasadena or Arcadia .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What size house would you like ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We need a medium-sized house with at least 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you interested in being in a particular school district ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we want to stay in the ABC School District .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you like a home near the lake or would you prefer a view ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would love to have a home with a view .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine , I will begin a search for the perfect home for you . I will call you in a few days .
segments.speaker: S2
